38894198.review:
Wow, what an enjoyable game!

Plenty of engaging moments where the story and dialogue made my cheeks hard from laughter and other areas often as well! ;-)

The story is very interesting and relatable, plenty of humor, interesting characters to pique your interest, and more than plenty of eye candy for your pick to pursue more dialogue, a character interest, or those adult scenes that are very detailed and don't hold back.

With that said, it's not a vulgar game and doesn't present itself as porn but an adult, mature interactive visual novel with quality to it. I really wish we had more games like this with different stories and settings. 

I can't express my level of appreciation for this game from a gay man's perspective. In a video game culture dominated by weebs and overemphasized females in every game and genre arch it's rare to come across a game that clearly proves its creators were knowledgeable on gay culture and behavior. It felt real and relatable.

Oh, and this was my first visual novel game. I'm very impressed! I finished the game in about two hours or so on my first playthrough, but I don't think that time is indicative of it's level of content given the multiple paths you can take and side events and extras. Plus, I may have sabotaged some events and cut myself shorter than anticipated. 

I'm eager to go back to try and unlock the other achievements and see more of the many alternative paths! Not to mention the extra content outside the main storyline that's provides some extra "side quests" so to speak or dialogues/events. I was dying during the fish incident! 

I'm very happy the developers did full exposure on their artwork during the adult scenes. By default, the game is censored, but if you can download a file from the developer's website that will decensor the game for you giving you full details with no censor boxes.

Great game! We need more of these for gaymers.

38664274.review:
It's worth mentioning first and foremost that I originally played Coming Out on Top long before it made its way to Steam, back during its original launch when it was distributed via BMT directly through Obscura.

Coming Out on Top is without a doubt, one of the most entertaining games I've ever played in my life. It was wonderfully crafted and developed with great amounts of effort, love, and care. The artwork and design is phenomenal, the writing is brilliant, the gameplay is addictive, and the stories truly resonate. The theme definitely isn't for everyone and if you're open-minded enough to get past the adult nature, you will find immense enjoyment with this visual novel.

Mark (or whatever you choose to name him) is a character that I was able to relate to on a very personal level and I think that's what attracted me to this game the most. I've been in similar situations as him, trying to find my place in the world and experiencing many different things coming-of-age and coming to terms with who I am as a person.

The stories are charming and the decision-making paired with the choice-and-consequence allow for several different paths and endings, leading to remarkable replay value. As I followed along with each stage in development, each update, I never wanted this game to end. It left me wanting more and more, but remaining utterly satisfied at the same time.

I can't wait for a sequel.

38144834.review:
I bought this game when it first came out, back in 2015. They've added a whole bunch of new content since then, so I eagerly redownloaded it onto my Mac when I found out about its new Steam release. COOT was the first visual novel  I ever tried, but it's easily one of my favorite games ever, just in general. It has awesome humor, a loveable cast, and fantastic storytelling. 

When I first got this game, I was actually still a student - just like Mark - so I felt some type of relatability to his character. Now two years later, I've just graduated, and I will say that COOT definitely played a role in shaping my college experience to some degree. It's one of those games that you just don't forget about (especially considering the lack of games about gay guys to begin with). Tryng to unlock all of the CGs and achievements is something I really look forward to. 10/10 would recommend.

37981193.review:
从来没有谈过恋爱的我，遇见了COOT。
我以前并不喜欢这种类型的RPG游戏，也没想过会玩。所以一开始只是好奇，好奇如果我有机会谈一场恋爱，会是什么样子？因为我真的觉得自己快要丧失关于爱的一切了。
没想到一开始就一连串的激情。这种全身心的投入与释放，算是给了我一种新的人生体验。但同时也很害怕，觉得这游戏太伤身体了，要间隔着玩（但其实后面还好，并没有无数的激情铺天盖地而来）。
因为主要是想预测下自己的未来。所以，我一直以现实中真实的自己在玩。然后就是，我喜欢上了Lan，并拒绝了其他一切人。可是万万没想到的是，最后我依旧单身。当然我也尝试了另一个版本，和Lan的一段S&M，才和Lan修成了正果。感觉结局要么就是注孤生，要么就是惊悚片。但我还是坚持注孤生的版本，因为那才是我。我喜欢Lan是因为他偶尔对我黏黏的。在我发觉自己对他有感觉后，就想跳过其他所有剧情。我最后选择对Lan放手，是在他说他要去找Zoe的那一刻。我当时觉得好累，就像我走过的所有路一样。所以，我毅然决然的选择放弃。觉得如果能成，就一定能成。成不了，也就成不了。我做出努力了，剩下的看造化。没想到真的就又这样错过了。
说实在的，我没有心力去玩其他线或另一种玩法。我基本没解锁什么成就，很多剧情甚至都没玩到，甚至连有些人都没有见到。但就像我说的，我已经做自己了。我不想做别人，更不想为了恋爱而做别人。
游戏本身超赞，情感的捕捉很精准，节奏很嗨。相信除了我之外的玩家都能找到另一半。我只是感慨自己的路。不过，我也更加的确认自己喜欢什么样类型的人了，那就是Lan这种完美的西班牙体质男人。

37853149.review:
Finally out on Steam!
Got the game when it was officially released and played it through straight away.
The game's main routes involve quite interesting interactions between the MC and love interests. The love interests all have their own uniqueness and plot line.
The choices the MC can make are quite convoluted and it is fairly easy to make mistakes.
The bonus dates are intereting little side stories in themselves, too.
I'll admit that some of the lines are quite cheesy, though funny.
Overall, the game is a fairly nice dating visual novel game. It is hard for me personally to find much fault with it. Although, since I've played through the game completely before it was on Steam, it may take me awhile to replay it again.

If I had to list a con, I have to say the Alex route is a bit disappointing for me. Though the plot line in his story is quite interesting, I was hoping for more sexy interactions between him and the MC.

37847834.review: I was surprised to actually enjoy this game a great deal. The lines were cute and funny, and there are a ton of outcomes possible. I was happy with my ending, but should have tried harder to go for my original target I thought was str8. XD

37835435.review:
Un jeu de drague gay... 

Je l'ai acheté pour soutenir l'initiative (ouais bon, ok, il date de 2013, je crois, je suis à la bourre, mais le coeur y est !). 
Je ne connaissais pas particulièrement ce genre de jeu, mais celui-ci m'a conquis ! 

Le scénario est simpliste, un peu cliché sur le plan romantique, mais les personnages, homos et hétéros, sont bien travaillés et sans traditionnels clichés que l'on voit partout (comme Zaza Napoli ^^). 
Un gros point fort, c'est l'écriture ! Qu'est-ce que j'ai ri ! C'est drôle et toujours bien placé, jamais ridicule. 
J'ai aussi beaucoup aimé le "rembobinage" : lorsque l'on fait un choix ou que l'on rate une phrase, on peut revenir en arrière pour rattraper tout ça. Cela nous permet de faire plusieurs choix de dialogues qui suscitent donc différentes réactions, parfois hilarantes ! 
Dernier point : c'est très touchant ! Les relations ne sont pas celles des films pornos du style : "bonjour, je suis plombier, je vais m'occuper de vos tuyaux !", c'est vraiment scénarisé et bien écrit (je me répète mais c'est le Maître-mot). 

Je mets une alerte toutefois : ATTENTION, il y a des scênes de sexe ! C'est flouté, mais quand même (même si on peut décensurer tout ça ! ^^) ! Si on ne s'y attend pas, ça envoie du paté ! ^^ Je suis gay, je n'ai donc pas été géné, mais j'ai été surpris tout de même. 

18/20 !

37797601.review:
I don't usually play dating sim games but I like this one thus I recommend it. There are 6 main love interests that have their own interesting stories and problems. You'll have to deal with the problem as partners otherwise you won't get their good ending. Plus if you don't want any of the 6 main guys, there are still extra date-able characters you can interact. 

Positives:
-Beautiful art especially the gallery ;)
-Hot and steamy
-Quirky and witty lines
-It's gay
-Extra date-able characters
-Main and extra guys are customizable
-Replayable
-Most importantly, you can adjust text speed (Thank goodness)

Negatives:
-I find it short but that's just my opinion.

Unrelated:
-I really love when the music changes. You just know that the next scenes are gonna be it. It also reminds me of older videos.
-Man, I wish Tommy was a main love interest.

As previously stated, the only thing that bugged me is that it's short. If you don't mind it, get the game. If you're having second thoughts, buy this on sale. Lastly if you're gonna buy this, do me a favor and de-censor the game. Check the game forums for further instructions. You won't regret it ;)

You see... this game is JUST a visual novel. No big expectations. It's funny, it's easy. 
But there is something special about it: Characters.
I really think that some of characters from COOT are masterpieces. At the end of the day this game is just a wall of text with some pictures. The characters make you want to read all of it. They have interesting backstories and personalities. 

But.. there is one big disadvantage. After dating all characters in main game you have only short bonus dates left and then... You can only play again and again almost the same way to earn bonus pictures in gallery and/or achivements or you can put the game away. I wish there were few more "main" characters or bonus dates should be longer.

In break from playing more exciting games... It's a good choice.

37170815.review: Coming Out on Top is a visual novel, and I'm not usually a fan of this genre. This one though is, simply put, amazing! The various paths are interesting to say the least, and each and every character unique. The dialogues vary from hilarious to awkward and the sex scenes steamy. But most of all I really appreciated the goofness of some of the dialogues, which had me laughing for hours. Trying to unlock all the gallery pics, or the achievements is fun too, and gives you the opportunity to follow options you normally wouldn't have. In the end I'd really like to hang out with Mark, Ian, and Penny!

36592555.review: 作为DreamDaddy的死忠，当然不会错过这个游戏啦，最开始因为他的价格犹豫了一会最后还是买了 ，事实证明是，如果你喜欢DD这样的游戏那么这个游戏可以说相当相当的便宜了！它拥有相当庞大的剧情和故事，可选人物以及性癖都相当棒，你甚至还可以把这个游戏当做个H游戏来撸（国内版是马赛克版的，惨不忍睹的都被和谐了，如果要完整版本官网上有补丁）就算你不喜欢那些H场景，这个也能很好的满足你，因为国内阉割版实在是和谐的什么都不剩了。最有特色的是的毛发以及胡子开关，这是本作最棒的一点，满足了各种需求，而且他的剧情很长，每个人物需要攻略很久，所以比DD好在他的真实性以及长时间的可玩性，还有Bonus的Dating也是惊喜满满，因此给这个游戏满分，不过值得注意的是，本座偏欧美壮汉风，因此喜欢弱受的可能就没有机会了，也没有太多的美男子，全文都是英文，要求比DD高很多，但是写的可以说肉香满满了，喜欢的话还是不要因为英语放弃这个相当棒的游戏，祝各位玩的好啦！

36217082.review:
I purchased Coming Out on Top (COOT) several years back, and got a Steam key when it was released here.

A heads up about the product: COOT is a visual novel dating sim where you play as a final year college student who just came out of the closet as gay. The genre is very different to most games out there in which it's like a choose-your-own-adventure novel, as indicated by the screenshots. There is no voice acting. There is sexual content and it's pixellated in the Steam version. Obscurasoft's website provides instructions on how to uncensor it, strictly for 18+ folks.

I enjoy the writing in COOT, how the game doesn't take itself 100% seriously. When briefly touching on themes of homophobia (Phil's route), polyamory (a Brofinder bonus date), and so on, the writing is serious around those subjects however. There's not a lot I can say objectively about this game.

If you're a fast reader, the game will seem short. The quality of content makes up for it well however.

There is a demo available at https://obscurasoft.com/demo-18-only/ for folks interested in this game. Also on the site are more screenshots. My advice is that if you like the demo and screenshots, you'll enjoy the full game.

36118061.review:
I bought this elsewhere and received my steam key later (which they sent me really quickly; go to the discussions and it'll tell you how to get a key if you purchased it on their site) and played it two playthroughs outside of steam, so ignore the short playtime.

This game is awesome. At first I was put off by the art style since that's not normally my thing, but once you get used to it, it's great. The writing is very good, though some of the humor came with heavy secondhand embarrassment, and the story doesn't take itself too seriously. There's a lot of substance to the different routes and they're all engaging. It knows you're playing for the sexy guys, but doesn't cheap out by giving half-assed writing.

The characters are probably the best part (aside from the H-scenes, which are VERY nice). There's only six main routes but ten additional guys to do one off dates with, which adds to the length of the gameplay but doesn't feel like padding. (Though I would die for a full route with Terrence.) There's a good amount of diversity in both appearances and personalities. THe main character's personality is flexible but still feels a bit murky even when you try to pick similar dialogue options/choices. 

All in all, this is a great game that's definitely worth the money.

Coming Out On Top delivers meaningful choices, romance, comedy, and real emotion, along with VERY sexy scenes for those looking. It isn't shy about sexual themes, stands brave and proud against fear and bigotry, and offers a grossly underserved demographic a shot not only at representation, but an experience of impressive and unrivaled quality.

35957215.review:
I absolutely love this game. I bought it before it was available via Steam and now also own the Steam supported game as well. 
Coming Out On Top is a “gay” story dating simulation based game, so there will be much reading involved, and the stories are fantastic!! They vary from wild, dirty humor to warm and caring, with a start and end. 

The bonus dates are pretty wild and fun! You’re able to mark your progression through the gallery pictures you unlock by meeting new men, while you press on through your final year at college. 

I hope there are more added dates in the future, as I really enjoy this game! 

More Ian!! And Love the “Slurpy” story… that’s a hilarious surprise you’ll just have to experience for yourself :D

35954637.review:
I've followed the development for this game since 2013, I bought it right when it was released, and it has lived up to my expectations and beyond that. It does what games like Dream Daddy fails to do. The artwork is really nice, the stories are realistic, and you can actually feel yourself bonding with the characters. No matter what main character you decide to pursue, you'll find that there's many ways to go, including a few easter eggs along the way, and it really takes many playthroughs to experience the entire game. If you do as little as change one option in a playthrough, it'll affect the road you're taking and the ending tremendously.  There's so much content and it makes it worth every single penny. This is the best dating simulator I've ever played. Heck, even though I bought it over 2 years ago, I still play it every once in a while!

The fact that it's on Steam makes me so happy, and I hope more people will find this game and enjoy it just like I did.

Well done, Obscurasoft.

(by the way, if possible, you should add voice actors to all the characters!)

35927565.review:
I got this game as a gift but I would highly reccomend it to anyone who likes men and games that don't take themselves seriously. The game is definitely not realistic, but it doesn't attempt to hide this and makes full use to make the game funny and enjoyable. There's a surprising amount of content for how quickly the game goes by, and I found every playthrough would pretty much make me find new content. 

That all said, the game is FAST and you will find yourself sitting through the same scenes multiple times regardless of who you're shooting for. Luckily there is a skip option, so it's not too bad, but even then it does still get a little tedious.

Another complaint I have is that several of the characters are just genuinely awful people, though I think that's kind of part of the genre and a bit more of a personal taste.

Overall I would say the game is really enjoyable and a unique experience.

"a sim meeting app"... yeah sure... whatever. I choose to test it only because it was queer and i felt...judgy, lets admit it.
So it really was about intellectual curiosity to see how well made (design, story, gameplay - I'm a game dev as well) and open mind it would be (playing with stereotypes and fantasms without falling into ultra predictable boredomness).

Damn, I was not deceived. It's surprisingly really enjoyable (it's ofc way too short ;p ).
I never even thought of playing a 'meeting app sim', so I can't really compare thou.

++ stories: you will feel things (not speeking about sex or lust here), it's well written, genuine, cute, "perfect" (as in fantasies and stereotype, personnaly, I don't read stories to face the everyday bullshit)
++ hot: it's definitely not porn (get the un-sensored version thou!), you will get 1 hot (or fun) picture as a reward here and there but it mostly uses story-line and fantasms to reach its goal. (in fact, it turned me on more than porn... but that's personal I guess ;p ). Don't take me wrong, it's full of adult content!
+ full of humour (tested it with some hetreo friends, most women love it, some men did as well -like a 3rd...- )
+ ergonomic gameplay (automatic-skip-already-read-text and reload system -to go the dialogs backward- works pretty well to test many routes in a comfortable way)
+ I feel like I felt in love 6 times in 1 week end ;) really envigorating 0:)

- waking up every morning with a charming "Rise and Shine!" as a 1st thought (GET OUT OF MY HEAD YOU SUCCUBUS)

- why was I not part of this project? I'd be proud ;p

35810515.review: I think this game does what it advertises very well, It's well written, it's funny, it's got a ton of great characters, and the illustrations are gorgeous. Heavily recommended for any VN fans or any people interested in steamy guy action.

35806069.review: One of the best games I have played. It's nice to feel represented and be a part of the many romances that I've only seen straight people play out. Whether you have a crush on your best friend, or your professor, or the quarterback, this game lets you live it as the gay man you are. It also makes gay relationships seem realistic, and doesn't rely heavily upon stereotypes. All around, this game makes the gay me feel heard, and empowered.

35797330.review:
First, it's a text-based game.  There are great illustrations, but the game play is all about reading and responding.

Second, a single play-through of the game is relatively short; maybe an hour or two.  

Third, it's gay.  The main character is gay.  The relationships are gay.  The whole approach is gay.  It's just as advertised.

If you're okay with all three of the above, it's absolutely a great game.  The dialogue is witty and frequently laugh out loud funny.  The situations and choices range from realistic, to absurdly bizarre, to "why doesn't this ever happen to me?"   One of the major strengths of the game is its branching in seemingly insignificant dialogue choices.   Deciding to wear a hat can change your entire life.  After a number of playthroughs, I'm still being surprised by the variety of outcomes possible and that some of the paths are more poignant than "happy".  Occasionally, stepping through dialague that you've already been through to get to another choice can be a little long, but that's a minor nit and the payoff has usually been well worth it.  The game as delivered used censored illustrations of some of the encounter screens, but I consider this a NSFW game in any case with partial nudity and some written dialogue displayed in large text on the screen.  For personal use, the uncensored screens are a fun update noted in the forums.


Overall, I found it engaging, fun, and worth well more than the $15.

35783878.review: Bought this when it first came out years ago. Really hot. Between the various guys there's fantasies for pretty much anyone into guys. It's also just really well written, funny and entertaining. One of my favourite games.

35783557.review: This game defines the term "hidden gem" for it has everything you'd ever want from a dating sim. Beautifully written story with characters that you simply can't get enough of. I originally bought this game in 2014 simply looking for a game with hot guys but man, this really exceeded all my expectations! So glad that it was released on Steam :)

35774425.review:
[TL/DR: It's a great game and I highly recommend it, but knowing what you get and what you don't with this game can improve your experience. Read on if you're not sure if this game is for you.]

I've been a huge fan of this game since I discovered it several years ago, and it just keeps getting better. Lot of game time on this, but mostly on the pre-Steam version.

What to expect:
1) This is a gay dating simulator, so the fun comes from reading descriptions and dialogue, making choices and watching what happens. If you're looking for more gameplay than that, this might not be for you.
2) Getting to a desirable ending might take a few tries. Don't be discouraged if the first time you play you get all the way through and get a bland or negative result. Some choices will cut out options, so attempting to do everything in one play will NOT work. Play and replay to find new things. Save often.
3) The images are censored by default, but there are instructions available for downloading uncensored content if that is to your liking.
4) The are a lot of settings help tailor the game to your preferences, but be warned that some situations may go places that aren't to your tastes. There will generally be fair warning and options given in game to avoid anything undesired.

Pros:
1) Fun and sexy, sexy, sexy.
2) Great writing and great story lines. Some situataions are more plausible than others, sure, but there are some delightul surprises and even touching moments. There's a LOT of terrific writing here and a LOT of variations. The best moments may not appear the first time, but stick with it and try again. There's so much worth finding.
3) Great characters. I found myself liking many of the characters and personalities. Some of the plot lines were heartwarming in addition to being sexy.
4) Great art. The expressions on the characters are priceless. Much of the humor comes from clever character reactions. Nice variety. And yes, the explicit artwork is great, too, but it's also nice that characters are fun to be with during dialog as well. The level of detail is impressive. NOTE: It was a surprise for me that the "action" art is in a different, somewhat more realistic style than the main game. It took a little getting used to as I'd already adjusted to the "cartoon" versions, but mostly a plus for me.
5) Lots of humor. There are many kinds of encounters here and attention has been paid to creating characters whose humor evolves through the developing situations. 
6) Lots of variety. The game has room for some insane options if you want to go there. :)
7) Replay value. Many of the play lines are mutually exclusive, so replaying is a must. Can also be a con, especially if you don't realize you HAVE to replay to get everything or if you're wanting to find EVERYTHING.

Cons (neither of which bother me too much):
1) Delayed gratification. Sometimes going for early sexy action can lock out later good times (or better endings). While this is a perfectly fine life lesson, it's hard to pick up on in a game. Since there's no way to know what's ahead, choosing to enjoy any sexy that comes your way (so to speak) seems natural, but might lead to a sluggish, limited game later on. My first few times weren't great paths, and others might feel disappointed. However, if you see it as learning the style and flow of the game, then replay will reward you. It can feel strange to have to replay to get all the sexy action with any specific character, but knowing that up front can avoid frustration.
2) Finding everything. The game has lots of branching, with options opened or excluded as you go along. Many of the major branching choices are not obvious, so it's easy to get lost in paths that don't lead to exciting conclusions. Would like see games like this have a hint system so that you can either find everything yourself, or get various levels of guidence (reminders) for what options you haven't tried, or what options should be avoided to go new places. Because of the branching choices nature of the game, it should be possible to basically build in a completion guide as part of the play, tailored to the player's desired level of "spoilers". I think this would help satisfy the DIYers and the "readers" who don't want to hunt and everything in between. The good news is that now that this is on Steam, there is a high probability that completion guides will get created.

Bottom line (so to speak): Much fun, great writing, I found the tone, humor and sexiness worth the replay and the hunting for endings.

35770359.review:
I cannot recommend this game enough. Bought it on Kickstarter some years ago and didn't cry over the 20 €. 

Pro:
Finally (!) a dating sim with non-anime artwork, excellent writing, funny lines, lovely pictures, explicit content (if you're over 18), loveable characters ... and it is all gay! Hurray! 
You can even decide if each of the characters (plus the mc) has beard and/or body hair. Same goes for all the one night stands.
Very nice and helpful developer who does her best to assist with problems.

There are just two negative points for me:
1. The music lacks a bit but that's a minor thing since the rest is really done very well. Apart from the opening track the rest of the music is quite boring. 
2. Some routes are way longer than others. If you happen to like [spoiler]Alex[/spoiler] best, you may find his route is not that much worked out like, for example [spoiler]Amos[/spoiler]. But maybe that is just my personal opinion and you might be satisfied with it.

[spoiler]Fish are evil.[/spoiler]

Btw: All my reviews have gotten downvotes "mysterically" after I posted this one. Coincidence? Or kiddie-hate? You decide.

35763645.review:
无论承认抑或否认，男人的故事永远都是充满着神秘的诱惑力，热情、精湛、然而又带着一点诗意，而这在这款游戏里，非常巧妙的将这份魅力逐步升温。它，很经典，很有男子汉的气魄，又在这份厚重的剧情烘托下，更彰显出性感成熟。它，激情四射。

当男人与男人为伍时，仿佛与病态齐肩。用着高贵的浪漫与执着的张扬，一如刀剑的灰色出鞘，让每一瞬间的刀光剑影都挥舞着彩虹色的光影。行云流水般展现着病态，务实而精致，甚至还很腹黑，模糊了这病态的界线。飘逸得似乎忘却病态的灵魂，安逸得仿佛逃脱性别的范畴。用了几乎完美的智慧让外人接受了他的另类和文人式的骄傲，坚持自我的反复打磨，打磨到没有丝毫病态的痕迹。

当男人与男人极端的短兵相接，残酷而壮烈。在碰撞过程中，让玩家选择站对了自己队伍。有人避而远之，也有人交口称赞。这是一种悲悯的情怀，让我们勇于面对自己的癖好，发现更真实的、更人性的自己。男人间的交相辉映，那是空前绝后的幸福时刻，他们举起利刃，仿佛一切阻碍物都可以一剑见血。这样完整的撞击，关乎着过去，关乎着未来、关乎着尊严。

35761644.review:
For the most part the game is great, though there are a few ..I don't want to say nagatives as much as disagreements. The main being that the stories aren't entirely believable, yes I realize this is a game, but on most if not all of the dates you have to chase after the dudes and pretty much stalk/beg them to be with you. I think in most the cases any self respecting dude wouldn't bother, but I suppose were meant to play the desperate guy? 

I also wasn't expecting the game to be so short, though I gotta admit this is my first dating sim game so not sure if that's just how these games are. I get that these aren't big budget games, but while the game has replay value...it seems to go by entirely too quick. I guess I would have just liked to have seen a more extensive story even if they reused backgrounds and character models. One that lasted for more than 15-30minutes.

All in all I'm pleased with my purchase, just hope future games like this are a little more in depth and expansive with their content. A semester that lasted a month to play through rather than a half an hour would be nice. And I would have loved to have seen Hugh and Jesse be in the main cast lineup :D who doesn't wanna date hot identical twins!?

35748621.review:
Love it. Funny, sexy, hot, the art is amazing... the first dating sim I've played and the best one so far. Also, the adition of new "brofinder dates" keeps it fresh. The storylines are very different from one another and they all demand some serious work to unlock 100%. The rooster of datable guys is very large and they are all unique in personality and appearence. 

Keep in mind that this is a Visual Novel game, so the gameplay is pretty much the same (pressing space bar or left clicking the screen), but the story and the exploration of the various routes more than makes up for it. Each route isn't necessarily long, but they are very engaging and the sheer number of routes gives it a great replay value, but be prepared for a lot of reading.

It isn't a game for everyone but, if you enjoy dating sims, story driven games and homoaffective relashionships don't bother you, then you should have a great time playing it.

Ian <3

35719868.review:
^ Ignore the thumbs down from the bigots who are bombing positive reviews for this game -- all because the subject matter of this VN is gay males. ^

Coming Out On Top is probably one of the best VNs I've played, and I've played quite a few (no sexual preference barred, either, I'm not just here for almost loli catgirls like anime-loving neckbeards are).

If you're militantly not into gay stuff, move on, this isn't the game for you. It was never intended for you and I'm not quite sure why you're here reading this instead of getting on with your life.

Back on point -- It's funny, charming, and has plenty of routes to go down. The reviews by RPS and Eurogamer above are pretty dang on point.

35719474.review:
Fantastic game! Very well written with witty dialogue. A huge cast of likable (and dateable/screwable) characters. There are serious endings you have to really work towards, hot endings that are more for..."fun", and there are also some really funny "WTF" endings. The art is amazing. The sex scenes are incredibly hot (play them uncensored!). I'm so glad Steam is giving gay people a platform in the gaming community. This game is important.

Dream Daddy by the Game Grumps is a good game made by good people, but it doesn't take the risky moves Coming Out On Top does. What Coming Out On Top lacks in mini-games, it makes up for in genuine, realistic love stories and gay relationships that are actually sexual. This game gets pornographic if that's where you want to take the story. It doesn't shame or lecture the player, there are tons of fantasies you can live out in this game. The steamy (ha, STEAMy) scenes are clearly made for people who appreciate the male body. There's no fade to black after you start kissing. COOT has the balls (lol, balls) to actually let you make choices in these scenes. Want to be a top? Want to be a bottom? Cool, you can choose! But even more than that, what do you say during this event? How do you want you character to feel? Is this too much, and do you want to stop? You can. Or do you want to keep going and reach the...climax of the scene? WHERE do you want to...finish? The amount of choices you get in this game seem endless, even down to picking if the guys have body hair and beards, or if you want to use condoms or not. This game doesn't hold back. It's for grown ups, like the old adventure games of the 1980s used to be.

Most importantly, this game can be a real tool for people who are thinking about coming out. It really shows how it's not the end of the world - but it's also not always a cake walk. You can have a really depressing ending, or you can be brave and fight through some tough choices and get the happy ending you want.

Coming Out On Top gets an A+ from me. A LOT of hard work went into this, and it really shows.

35687327.review:
Honestly, the game doesn't even need any of the sex-laden parts to make it worth buying. For those who want that it's extremely well done and isn't thrown in your face in the sense you're not constantly assaulted with 2D-porn, until the actual art comes on screen for the actual sex-related dialogue options if you opt to use the uncensored version, very graphic/uncompromising from what I've heard from a few who backed this long ago, which even if you don't want that the censored version is quite tasteful while still having a lot of the impact.

Where the game shines is the interaction/dialogue between the characters, especially the three main ones, which makes the game worth it alone for me. I found myself laughing at quite a few points, especially early on, then depending on the choices you make, things can either get more extreme and/or more serious in their tone. I certainly believe that the game provides a comfortable level of fantasy material for people while also providing situations and storylines that will resonate or at the very least be relatable to some degree for others.
